title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Inception
summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Dark Knight
summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc, Batman must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological challenges of his life.

title: Interstellar
summary: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions.

title: The Matrix
summary: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

title: Jurassic Park
summary: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine on an alien planet must decide where his loyalty lies.

title: Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, a stockbroker rises and falls in the world of finance.

title: The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman to escape a tyrannical warlord.

title: Shutter Island
summary: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: Whiplash
summary: A young drummer enrolls at a competitive music conservatory, where his dreams of greatness are mentored by a ruthless instructor.

title: Inside Out
summary: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life, her emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city and school.

title: Toy Story 3
summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic, right before Andy leaves for college.
